title: Bird Box - The Politics of Censorship - with Thomas Wijnaendts van Resandt
description:
Bird Box has become a very popular Netflix movie and it contains much symbolism which veers toward propaganda and a celebration of safe space culture.   

I did this interpretation as a discussion with Thomas Wijnaendts van Resandt, half of the team running the Storytellers Channel:  

https://bit.ly/2ofbLoG

My links:  

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

The podcast: https://soundcloud.com/jonathan-pagea...
website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicW...
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
